mapper.delete: delete from user_lession where user_id=#{user_id} and lession_id=#{lession_id} limit 1;
mapper.select: select * from lession where type = #{type} limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from user_lession ul inner join lession l on l.id = ul.lession_id where ul.user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.update: update lession set remain = remain-1 where id=#{id} and remain >= 1;
update lession set remain = remain+1 where id = #{id};
